data.name: Supermarket Simulator
data.detailed_description:
OUR OTHER GAMES

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1982080/Animal_Shelter__Puppies__Kittens_DLC/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1120320/Builder_Simulator/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1113010/Chernobyl_Liquidators_Simulator/


About the Game





Prepare for renovation
Check what elements of the store should be thrown away and replaced, and which ones need to be repaired. Prepare a plan to renovate the store so that its interior would be once again filled with shelves stuffed with different colored products.


Design the interior yourself
Design the interior of the store as you wish. Decide where to place the shelves with bread and where the electronics should stand. It is only up to you what products will appear on the shelves of the newly opened store.


Prepare market exterior
Remember that the outer side of the market is one of the most important things to focus on. Clear the parking lot, paint the lines, buy and place some trash cans. Finally gather shopping carts and prepare the ribbon for the grand opening.


Lights out and away we go
Check if every detail is taken care of. Paint the lawn in front of the store, cut the ribbon, and watch the first customers storm the shelves in search for discounted items. Next, go to another store and try to keep your good work.

data.short_description: Take care of old and forgotten supermarkets and prepare them for the grand reopening. Repair and renovate everything inside and outside the store.
data.supported_languages:
English*, Polish, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Portuguese, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Turkish
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4130 / AMD Phenom II X4
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 560 / AMD R7-260X
  • DirectX: Version 11
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7400 / AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 / AMD Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
